doc.field:
Grand Jury Subpoeana / Ain't it Grand? (2 items) Notes: Two posters produced by the Bay Area Committee to Stop the Grand Jury. These posters were distributed by the Irish Community Defense Committee. Of note is that one of the individuals being grabbed by the throat in one of the cells has an IRA armband.
Separate folders for "Grand Jury" and "Irish Committee Defense/Support Committee" in the collection.
